references.paper_title: Variance reduced value iteration and faster algorithms for solving Markov decision processes
references.reason: This paper provides the foundation for the faster randomized algorithms presented in the current work.

references.paper_title: Variance reduced value iteration and faster algorithms for solving Markov decision processes
references.reason: This paper introduces variance-reduced value iteration, a key technique used and improved upon in this work.

references.paper_title: Near-optimal time and sample complexities for solving Markov decision processes with a generative model
references.reason: This work provides state-of-the-art results in the sampling setting that this paper improves upon.

references.paper_title: Minimax PAC bounds on the sample complexity of reinforcement learning with a generative model
references.reason: This paper establishes fundamental sample complexity lower bounds for solving MDPs that provide context for the efficiency of this paper's proposed algorithms.

references.paper_title: Model-based reinforcement learning with a generative model is minimax optimal
references.reason: This paper shows that model-based methods can achieve optimal sample complexity for solving MDPs, which is contrasted with the model-free approach of this paper.
